story: You open your eyes to a forest. Tall trees surround you and you hear a little scuffle behind you. You turn around to see a small, chubby pig.
That cute pig you named Mr. Oinks gets snatched away in a blur.
You search desparately for Mr. Oinks and stumble upon a nearby village. You shout and plead for help finding him.
dialog: Player: "My pet pig, Mr. Oinks has been taken."
Woman: "Have you tried the local butcher's He gets fresh pigs every day."

story: The woman points you in the right direction.
You burst into the butcher's shop.
dialog: Butcher: "'fraid that's not my name. I can help ya if yer lookin fer someone else in town."
Player: "Let me see your live pigs please."
Butcher: "Oh no. I ain’t trustin no one that bursts into my shop accusin me of thievery and murderin loved ones. I have a heart ya know."

options.plead: Player: "I’m sorry, but please let me just take a little peek."

dialog: Butcher: "If you can guess the word I'm thinkin of in a minute you can have a peek."

options.yes: Try to guess the butcher's words.
options.no: Leave and try checking in the back for Mr. Oinks.

story: Play Hangman. Guess 5 words in 60 seconds.
You sneak around the back. Mr. Oinks might be there.
You beat the butcher's game and he leads you to the pigs.

dialog: 'Fraid a deal's a deal, now git outta my shop before ya scaree away my loyal customers.

story: You sneak around the back anyways. Mr. Oinks might be there.
dialog: 'Fraid a deal's a deal, now git outta my shop before ya scaree away my loyal customers.

story: You take a look, but Mr. Oinks could not be found.
There isn't much left to search in the village. Saddened once more, you go on your way, calling Mr. Oinks occasionally hoping for his squeal in reply.
